root.name: NCAA Football 10
root.description: Cover AthleteOn April 20, 2009, EA announced the names of the graduating college football players who would grace the NCAA Football 10 cover. Each console received a different star on its cover:Â Michael Crabtree WR, Texas Tech University (Xbox 360)Brian Johnson QB, Utah (Playstation 3)Brian Orakpo DE, Texas (PS2)Mark Sanchez QB, USC (PSP) EA Team BuilderNCAA 10 allows you to go online and create a school to use in the game. You can customize the logo, uniforms, fields, mascots, programs, and rosters of the team and when the game is released you can download the team to the hard drive and play.
